data.name: Xenocite Clad Demo
data.detailed_description:
Xenocite Clad places you in the long forgotten ruins of an advanced civilization that seemed to disappear overnight. Now, centuries later, the ruins have filled with life both threatening and non. Brave the ruins against predators and more as you search for not only a way out but the answers to the questions strewn all around you. Play as two heroines- Xalia the Syr, using both an energy blade and an energy compressor drone, she seeks to learn more of her creators and their intentions this path will make her face the sins of her fathers and right them. ...and well you don't need to know about the other one yet do you?

Features:

- Fast paced pixelated action. Feel each hit you land and are struck with as you strive to survive.

- Two stories to show opposing sides of the conflict that embroils the outside world

- Over 100 pieces of lost data to discover and use to your advantage.

- Five game modes including: Speedrun, Veteran, and Truth!

- Customize how you play using the chip builds and upgrades, each with their own advantage and disadvantage.

- Find yourself caught in the crossfire as two entities war over control of the areas and their systems around you changing the challenges and the paths through which you can progress. Either endure their control or wrest it away for yourself.

- A fantastic OST created with the incredible talents of John Sinclair and GlitchxCity

The game is not yet completed, and the launch date is still TBA, so it is not currently available for purchase. Do stay tuned for updates on its production!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 412 MB available space
